explanation: [0-0] A man wearing a black shirt and grey trousers stands beside a table with a plastic bottle full of blue liquid on it. The man is holding a blue object. The background is a painting of traditional ancient architecture with trees around it. The subtitle "Itty Bitty" in white font is displayed at the top of the video.

[0-6] The man takes out a small knife from the blue object and hits the bottle cap. Then a larger bottle appears on the table. The man picks up a large golden knife, then an even larger samurai sword, and slashes at the bottle. The bottle falls onto the table, spilling some water, and the man takes the bottle away. The subtitle "Small" in white font is displayed at the top of the screen.
